channel.title: Needing Some (Probally) Easy and Quick Help
channel.description: Now that I have finally got mysql to work it says I need a username. I know my password for mysql but I do not no my usernade. I am doing this on my home computer if that helps any. Please help me, and help is appreciated. I know this is not an smf support forum but I jsut need my to know what my mysql user name is.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 29, 2008, 03:38:34 PM[/size][hr]Never mind, sorry if this is all considered spam, you can remove it. I figured it out after trying it 20 times I though of linux and typed in root..........
